user_query: I'm planning a hiking trip to the Canadian Rockies and need to know the boundaries of the LDUs in the area. Can you provide me with the LDUs' boundaries for Banff National Park? Also, simulate the geolocation for the hiking route and give me the details of the simulation.

TaskList.description: Query for the boundaries of the Land District Units (LDUs) in Banff National Park.
Simulate the geolocation for the planned hiking route in the Canadian Rockies.
